name: Cargo Convoy
description:
Lead the convoy to deliver the mech supplies!

A runner-style game set in a kaiju-infested world made for Mini Jam 81: Kaiju. Late and still unfinished, wanted to at least put up a playable version.

Music:

  • Unsafe Roads by Alexander Nakarada

Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/4923-unsafe-roads

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

  • Satiate - only percussion by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4320-satiate---only-percussion

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

  • Obliteration by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4151-obliteration

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
